name: Factotum (itch)
description:
FACTOTUM (PRE-ALPHA) GROW YOUR SHOP!

You are a multi talented artisan who is looking for something to do, so you have opened your own shop in Gleamsea Harbor and make use of your various skills such as smithing, woodwork, potion brewing and more.

Collect materials and create equipments, display it in your shop and make a fortune. It's that easy!

VARIOUS EQUIPMENT TYPES!

There are 8 types of craftable equipment, each with a unique property. It's up to you on which type of equipments you want to craft and sell. In fact, you can sell all assortments of equipments! 

OVER 100 ITEMS! 

There are tons of items to be found, some are more rare than others, and some can only be obtained by combining other items.

Factotum is still in development, more items will be added in the future!

DECORATE!

You can decorate by placing various furniture's and changing your shop's wallpaper. Move things around to your heart's content.

Try making an appealing shop, you might attract more customers!

MORE FEATURES COMING SOON! 

Thank you for checking out Factotum! The game is currently in development and would I like to hear some feedback!

The Windows version will come soon.
